select.id_ceh: SELECT id FROM struct_ceh WHERE caption = ? AND org_id = ?
select.id_uch: SELECT id FROM struct_uch WHERE caption = ? AND par_id = ? AND ceh_id = ?
select.id_rm: SELECT id FROM struct_rm WHERE ceh_id = ? AND uch_id = ? AND caption = ? ORDER BY id
select.id_analog: SELECT id FROM anal_group WHERE rm_id = ? AND main = ?

insert.add_org: INSERT INTO struct_org (caption, m_order, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, ?);
insert.add_ceh: INSERT INTO struct_ceh(org_id, caption, deleted, m_order, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.add_uch: INSERT INTO struct_uch(par_id, ceh_id, node_level, caption, deleted, m_order, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.add_rm: INSERT INTO struct_rm (caption, ceh_id, uch_id, codeok, etks, m_order, mguid, kut1, file_sout, ind_code, short_code) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.add_analog: INSERT INTO anal_group (group_id, rm_id, main) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
insert.per_genfactors: INSERT INTO per_genfactors (tabl4_id, caption, [time], time2, factor_id) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert.per_gigfactors: INSERT INTO per_gigfactors (rzona_id, factor_id, caption, proctime) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?);
insert.per_rzona_mat: INSERT INTO per_rzona_mat (rzona_id, factor_id, param_id, name, him_code, proctime, him_class, vid_vozd, pdk) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert.sout_dop_info2: INSERT INTO sout_dop_info2 (rm_id, fac2, fac9, fac10, fac11, fac12, fac13, fac14) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert.sout_dop_info_fact: INSERT INTO sout_dop_info_fact (rm_id, oborud, material, dopl, dopl_txt, dop_otpusk, dop_otpusk_txt, week, week_txt, milk, milk_txt, profpit, profpit_txt, lpo, lpo_txt, medosm, medosm_txt, operac_t, operac_n, pevm, dop_shum, dop_vibr, dop_infr, dop_ultr, dop_vibr_loc, dop_him, dop_apfd, dop_bio) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.sout_dop_info_norm: INSERT INTO sout_dop_info_norm (rm_id, dopl, dopl_osn, dopotpusk, dopotpusk_osn, week, week_osn, milk, milk_osn, profpit, profpit_osn, lpo, lpo_osn, medosm, medosm_osn, kut1, kut2, kut3, kut4, kut5, kut6, kut7, kut8, kut9, kut10, kut11, kut12, kut13, kut14) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.sout_factors: INSERT INTO sout_factors (rm_id, factor_name, factor_id, KUT, izm_date, version, sex, tmp, file, mguid) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
insert.sout_ident: INSERT INTO sout_ident (rm_id, is_ident, is_travma, is_profzab, kut, is_rab, rab_descr, is_pk6, is_dop1, is_dop2, dop1, dop2) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
insert.sout_karta_dop_info: INSERT INTO sout_karta_dop_info (rm_id, regim, trud) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
insert.sout_rabs: INSERT INTO sout_rabs (rm_id, fio, snils) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
insert.per_rzona_info: INSERT INTO `per_rzona_info` (zona_id, os_skor, os_patm, os_temp, os_vlag) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

update.update_analog: UPDATE anal_group SET group_id = ? WHERE id = ?
update.sout_dop_info_fact: UPDATE sout_dop_info_fact SET oborud=?, material=? WHERE id=?;
